title: Dig Deep
content:
Dig Deep Effect On a hit, inflict Shattered on a target. When attacking a Shattered target, deal an additional 1d4 Piercing damage. Equipment Deep Delver

On a hit, inflict Shattered on a target. When attacking a Shattered target, deal an additional 1d4 Piercing damage.

Dig Deep is an Equipment Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Equipment Features provide passive effects or new conditions that will help you in combat. These features are gained by simply wielding the corresponding item (Weapon, Armor,
